name: Berkeley
description: A fictional version of the city of Berkeley within the universe of the movie 'Oppenheimer'.

content.title: History
content.body: In the fictional narrative of **Oppenheimer**, Berkeley serves as a pivotal setting where J. Robert Oppenheimer conducts significant scientific work. As a university town, it supports a robust academic community that fuels Oppenheimer's research.

content.title: Geography
content.body: Situated in the state of California, the fictional Berkeley mirrors its real-world counterpart with sprawling university grounds and an academic atmosphere.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body:
- **University Campus**: The primary setting where Oppenheimer's scientific pursuits unfold. 
- **Academic Buildings**: Various fictional science labs where key research is conducted.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: Berkeley is essential to the narrative of **Oppenheimer** as it represents the cradle of theoretical physics where Oppenheimer and his colleagues make groundbreaking discoveries. The city's portrayal emphasizes both the intellectual vibrancy and political tensions of the era.
